Title: Before Midnight
Writer: Richard Linklater, Julie Delpy, Ethan Hawke, Richard Linklater (characters), Kim Krizan (characters)
Actors: Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Seamus Davey-Fitzpatrick, Jennifer Prior
Plot: We meet Jesse and Celine nine years on in Greece. Almost two decades have passed since their first meeting on that train bound for Vienna.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 20 wins & 62 nominations.
Production: Faliro House, Castle Rock Entertainment, Venture Forth
